content.question: What kind of developer am I?
columns: I'm responsible for making frontend look and feel like a cohesive product: I live alongside design, analytics, and business, not just in code
I build features fast and carefully, keep performance, SEO, and DX under control, organize a stable pipeline so the team doesn't get stuck on infrastructure

items.text: 15+ years in frontend: from MVP in startups to public platforms
Fintech, eCommerce, SaaS, media — different domains, one goal: conversion
Web, mobile, desktop — I know the constraints of each platform
I work shoulder to shoulder with design, backend, and product, keep everyone in the loop
I set up the pipeline: CI/CD, code style, tests, documentation — nothing hangs in the air
I digitize results: speed metrics, retention, impact on business
